data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Adjuntas, Puerto Rico not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Adjuntas, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Adjuntas.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Adjuntas that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 17,400 citizens of Adjuntas, Puerto Rico, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Adjuntas.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Adjuntas you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Adjuntas who will make disciples who make disciples.
